td.br: Have you chosen a middle school for your scholar for the 2020-2021 school year? If not, we're here to help ease the transition and provide options.
Free meals are being distributed to students after several campuses announced closures and suspended schedules amid coronavirus fears.

We have moved our instruction online, through Google Classroom. It is the same classroom that your students would normally sit in everyday, but now it is on the computer. Our students will see their teachers face everyday, be able to ask questions, continue to work with their classmates, complete assignments, and receive grades through Google Classroom.

Our goal is that our students continue to have access to instructional resources, throughout this time. Please continue to check our website, ClassDojo, Instagram, and Facebook for important updates regarding how your students will continue learning through Google Classroom.

We are all monitoring developments related to the Novel Coronavirus, known as 2019-nCoV, which was first identified in China. The Centers for Disease Control, or CDC, has determined that the immediate health risk from 2019-nCoV to the general American public is considered low at this time.
